extension.description:
xbmc-courrier is a script for read mail on POP or IMAP servers.
Based on the script and the skin of gmailchecker
Configure server in settings You can define the max size of messages and a filter to search messages in IMAP server You can scroll message text with FASTFORWARD (key f for the keyboard) and REWIND (key r)
At the moment you view message only in text mode and html message are convert in text with Beautilfulsoup and html2text "Aaron Swartz (me@aaronsw.com)" modules. On bottom you have status line with date and attach file name of the selected message For IMAP server you can define in SKIN your folder and the flag use for select message
